RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions

RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions Class Reference

#include <launcheroptions.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The option dialog of the launcher.

You can access this dialog with the 'Options' button of the launcher.

See also:
Launcher, OptionManager
Todo:
Add a screenshot

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

An enumeration definining the FOX identifiers.

This identifiers are needed by the FOX toolkit to handle events.

Enumerator:
ID_BUTTON  The FOX identifier of an unimplemented button.
ID_BTN_CANCEL  The FOX identifier of the 'Cancel' button.
ID_BTN_OK  The FOX identifier of the 'OK' button.
ID_BTN_OPTION  The FOX identifier of all OptionButtons.
ID_ATTRB_WIDGET  A single identifier for all attributes widgets but string.
ID_ATTRB_STRING  A identifier for string attributes.

Because we use SEL_CHANGED instead SEL_COMMAND for TextFields

ID_NEW_SNAP  The new snapshot button.
ID_SAVE_SNAP  The save snapshot button.
ID_CHANGE_SNAP  The snapshot combobox selection change.
ID_DEL_SNAP  The delete snapshot button.
ID_CPY_SNAP  The copy snapshot button.
ID_LAST  Internally used identifier.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::update (  ) 

Graphically update the attribute content.

It simply calls OptionManager::update(); This method is called by Launcher::onOptionsButtonPressed() at startup.

See also:
OptionManager::update()

long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::onNotImplemented ( FXObject *  o,
FXSelector  s,
void *  v 
)

An event receiver used during development.

The widgets that send a usefull signal that have unimplemented event handler are connected to this to avoid compilation errors.

Parameters:
o Internally used by FOX
s Internally used by FOX
v Internally used by FOX
Returns:
Always 1

FXShutterItem * RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::addOptionPanel ( FXShutter *  tab,
FXSwitcher *  com,
OptionPanel *  op 
)

Add an OptionPanel.

An OptionPanel is graphically represented by a FXShutterItem.

Parameters:
tab The parent of the new FXShutterItem
com The the FXSwitcher used to create the OptionButton of this panel
op The OptionPanel to create the FXShutterItem with
Returns:
The newly created FXShutterItem representing the OptionPanel

FXSwitcher* RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::swi [private]
